2.text: Use the given facts and write a description about any of these topics.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Use the given facts and write a description about any of these topics.</prosody></speak>

4.text: • A mountain peak near Anuradhapura. • A sacred place of worship for the Buddhists in Sri Lanka. • The place where Arahat Mahinda met King Devanampiyatissa. • Pilgrims go to worship Mihintale on Poson full moon Poya day (in June). • Many shrines and ruins can be seen. • Ambasthala stupa, The Kantaka stupa, Naga Pokuna (Snake
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>• A mountain peak near <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='anuɾaːd̪həpuɾə'>Anuradhapura</phoneme>. • A sacred place of worship for the Buddhists in Sri Lanka. • The place where Arahat <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='mahind̪ə'>Mahinda</phoneme> met King <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='d̪eːʋanampijat̪issə'>Devanampiyatissa</phoneme>. • Pilgrims go to worship <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='mihintale'>Mihintale</phoneme> on Poson full moon Poya day (in June). • Many shrines and ruins can be seen. • Ambasthala stupa, The Kantaka stupa, Naga Pokuna (Snake</prosody></speak>

5.text: Pond), Mihindu cave are some of them.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Pond), <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='mihindu'>Mihindu</phoneme> cave are some of them.</prosody></speak>

6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Traditional Foot Pilgrimage to <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='kat̪əɾagama'>Kataragama</phoneme> (PadaYathrei)</prosody></speak>

7.text: • A two month pilgrimage from Nagadeepa in Jaffna to Kataragama
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>• A two month pilgrimage from <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='nagad̪iːpa'>Nagadeepa</phoneme> in <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='jafna'>Jaffna</phoneme> to <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='kat̪əɾagama'>Kataragama</phoneme></prosody></speak>

8.text: shrine dedicated to God Skanda Murugan. • Mostly Hindu devotees, but people of other religions also
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>shrine dedicated to God Skanda Murugan. • Mostly Hindu devotees, but people of other religions also</prosody></speak>

9.text: participate. • Takes place in the months of May, June and July. • Commences at an auspicious time. • Covers about 5-6 miles a day. • Pilgrims rest at places of worship where they receive alms. • Arrive in Kataragama for the annual Esala festival and Perahera. • The pilgrims are mostly dressed in yellow clothes.
9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>participate. • Takes place in the months of May, June and July. • Commences at an auspicious time. • Covers about 5-6 miles a day. • Pilgrims rest at places of worship where they receive alms. • Arrive in <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='kat̪əɾagama'>Kataragama</phoneme> for the annual Esala festival and Perahera. • The pilgrims are mostly dressed in yellow clothes.</prosody></speak>
